main event: On 17 September 1954, a military pilot reported a sighting of a brilliant object near Clarkdale, Arizona, that flew faster than a jet.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a DC-4 aircraft., The sighting included ground and air visual observations., The object was observed flying from north to south before turning to a parallel course., Speed estimates ranged from 700 to 1000 mph., The nature of the object was undetermined, with conclusions leaning towards it being an aircraft, balloon, or astronomical object.
sighted object: a brilliant object in the sky
